|Title=To know the methods of interpretation of functional explorations allowing to orientate towards an obstructive CKD and towards a restrictive CKD.

see above

question.title: What is the primary goal of functional exploration in chronic respiratory failure?

option_a.title: To identify the underlying cause of the respiratory failure

option_b.title: To determine the level of lung function

option_c.title: To rule out other underlying conditions

option_d.title: To classify the type of respiratory failure
